item.title: Exploring the Enigma: Benefits and Risks of 5-MeO-DMT
item.description: Dive deep into the world of 5-MeO-DMT, a potent psychedelic found in toad secretions, and explore its potential benefits and inherent risks.
item.author: (Psychedelic Bible)

item.title: The Potentials and Risks of Bufo Alvarius Toad Secretions and 5-MeO-DMT
item.description: Exploring the powerful effects of Bufo Alvarius toad secretions and 5-MeO-DMT, focusing on the fascinating benefits and the critical risks involved.
item.author: (Psychedelic Bible)

item.title: Exploring the Potential Benefits and Risks of Using Phalaris Grass
item.description: Dive into the fascinating world of Phalaris grass, a plant that holds the key to powerful psychoactive compounds like DMT and 5-MeO-DMT. Explore both the potential benefits and inherent risks that accompany its use.
item.author: (Psychedelic Bible)
